item.title: Spider-Man: Into The Spider-Verse
item.description: There is something special about Spiderman. Though not the most powerful superhero, he is unmistakably charming, with a good sense of humor, which was probably why his movies were the ones to launch the modern superhero genre. And because he is not so grim and serious, somehow the same characteristics spill over into his world, and as a result we get a very entertaining set of villains, just like for Batman.
